title: Uber — Pricing Insights for Grocery & Retail
oneLiner: Highlight when groceries are cheaper than average so shoppers can make smarter choices.
details: Designed a pricing insights feature to surface when items are below typical prices.
Explored messaging framework variants and thresholds by collaborating with Content Design team.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams from Product Management, Content Design, Data Science, and Engineering.

title: Lume — Marketplace for Independent Designers
oneLiner: Help independent fashiondesigners gain visibility in a saturated market.
details: Independent fashion designers often have trouble getting discovered in a saturated market. They lack the resources, marketing power, and established platform exposure that larger brands have.
Conducted 8 user interviews, competitive analysis, and brainstorming sessions to ideate on the product. Then validated the final prototpye with 10 people total in 2 rounds of tesitng.

Lume combines curated search filters, social-style feeds, and shoppable moodboards to create meaningful connections between designers and audiences. For designers, Lume offers performance insights and simple tools to track orders, revenue, and engagement. For shoppers, it provides clear ways to explore by material, color, or concept, as well as inspiration through user-generated outfits and curated boards.

title: FlowFi — DeFi Liquidity Management Tool
oneLiner: Help crypto investors manage and optimize liquidity across decentralized finance platforms.
details: DeFi investors often struggle with fragmented tools, unclear performance tracking, and high barriers to understanding liquidity positions across protocols.

Conducted in-depth whitepaper research and competitive analysis of existing DeFi protocols to identify gaps in liquidity management. Used these insights to shape user flows and simplify portfolio tracking, then validated the final prototype through peer feedback during the hackathon.

FlowFi provides a dashboard that consolidates liquidity positions, real-time performance insights, and automated strategies to optimize returns. It reduces complexity for investors while giving them confidence and transparency in managing assets.

title: UX Club NYU — Brand Identity & Visual System
oneLiner: Create a fresh, approachable visual identity to unify UX Club NYU’s presence on campus.
details: Designed a cohesive brand identity to help UX Club NYU stand out and feel more approachable, using bold color pops to inject energy into the identity.
Worked as Lead Visual Designer leading a team of 3 over 2 weeks; developed assets including posters, event materials, and social media branding to create visual consistency.

Built a visual system that works across multiple touchpoints — ensuring that the brand feels recognizable whether it’s a poster, online post, or event announcement, while still feeling fresh, vibrant, and aligned with the UX community.
